actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: Resolution preventing U.S. troop from being introduced in the Middle East conflict without prior congressional authorization.

summary.text: Provides that it is the sense of the House of Representatives that United States troops not be introduced, committed, or involved, in any way or manner, directly or indirectly, in the present armed conflict in the Middle East without prior congressional authorization.

titles.title: Resolution preventing U.S. troop from being introduced in the Middle East conflict without prior congressional authorization.
